Problem.title: The Governance Gap
Problem.description: Organizations struggle to enforce engineering standards at scale.
Problem.card1Desc: Standards are defined in wikis but ignored in code reviews.
Problem.card2Desc: Upgrading a framework across 500 repos takes 18 months of meetings.
Problem.card3Desc: Patches rely on teams finding time in their roadmap.

Solution.title: Automated Governance
Solution.description: Define policies as code and enforce them automatically.
Solution.item1: Targeting: Define scope via metadata (e.g., 'framework: react')
Solution.item2: Action: Apply automated refactors or patches
Solution.item3: Validation: Run tests in isolated containers
Solution.item4: Rollout: Execute in waves to prevent outages

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Turn ad-hoc tasks into a repeatable industrial process.
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Fleetu continuously scans your entire codebase. Use metadata to target specific subsets (e.g., 'all nodejs-14 repos').
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Apply automated transformations (Operators). From simple search-and-replace to complex AST refactors via LLMs.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Changes are verified in isolated CI environments. If successful, Fleetu opens a PR or commits directly.
HowItWorks.step4Desc: Once a Shift is applied, Fleetu monitors for regression, automatically correcting any drift.

UseCases.title: Use Cases
UseCases.description: From security patches to complete refactors, Fleetu handles the complexity of large-scale engineering.
UseCases.case1Desc: Migrate 500+ microservices from Node 14 to 18 in a specific rollout wave.
UseCases.case2Desc: Detect Log4Shell across the fleet and apply the patch automatically within hours.
UseCases.case3Desc: Enforce a specific logging library and configuration across all Java services.
UseCases.case4Desc: Update Terraform modules or Kubernetes manifests across the entire organization.
